definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The research aimed to study the preparation of activated carbon with Macadamia shell.
sentences.chinese: 研究以廢棄澳洲堅果殼爲原料的活性炭製備。

sentences.english: The huge surface area of activated charcoal gives it countless bonding sites.
sentences.chinese: 活性炭巨大的表面積提供了大量的活性位點。

sentences.english: The immobilization of porcine pancreas lipase on active carbon by absorption has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 初步研究了以活性炭爲載體的豬胰脂酶吸附固定。

sentences.english: Adsorption of chlorobenzene from mixed gas by activated carbon was studied on fixed bed.
sentences.chinese: 研究了氯苯氣體在活性炭固定牀上的吸附過程。

sentences.english: The application of activated carbon fibers (ACFs) to removing phenol from water was studied.
sentences.chinese: 採用活性炭纖維吸附法淨化水中微量的苯酚。

sentences.english: Active carbon adsorbs poisonous gases and impurities in liquids.
sentences.chinese: 活性炭吸附毒氣和液體中的雜質。

sentences.english: After finishing backwashing, active carbon filter goes into operation.
sentences.chinese: 反洗完畢後，活性炭過濾器投入運行。

sentences.english: Active charcoal(0.5%)seriously inhibited bud initiation and the percentage reached only 1%.
sentences.chinese: 活性炭強烈抑制側芽的萌發，側芽萌發率僅1%左右。

sentences.english: RO- reverse osmosis pretreatment process for activated carbon and fine filter.
sentences.chinese: 反滲透預處理工藝主要爲活性炭和精濾。

sentences.english: Activated carbon carving which has 8 major advantages?
sentences.chinese: 活性炭雕有哪8大優勢呢？

sentences.english: Results of the experiments stated that activated carbon from pine root charcoal could be used as catalyst carrier.
sentences.chinese: 實驗證明，松根炭製成的活性炭可以作爲載體活性炭。

sentences.english: Results of the experiments stated that activated carbon from pine root charcoal could be used as catalyst carrier.
sentences.chinese: 實驗證明，松根炭製成的活性炭可以作爲載體活性炭。

sentences.english: At this stage the dominant operator products carve coconut palm and activated carbon.
sentences.chinese: 現階段主要的經營產品爲椰棕和活性炭雕。

sentences.english: Non-impregnated steam activated carbon is inert and non-toxic.
sentences.chinese: 非蒸汽浸漬活性炭是惰性和無毒。

sentences.english: The present paper described an application of activated carbon to the phenacetin production in details.
sentences.chinese: 詳細介紹活性炭在非那西丁生產中的應用狀況。

sentences.english: The present invention discloses method of reducing phthalic anhydride colour number by using active carbon.
sentences.chinese: 本發明公開了一種用活性炭降低苯酐色號的方法。

definition: porous/having many holes (e.g. filter gauze or sieve)
